actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to ensure the continued stability and viability of recreational opportunities on Lake Sakakawea in the State of North Dakota.
short_title: North Dakota Reservoir Management Improvement Act of 1989

summary.text: North Dakota Reservoir Management Improvement Act of 1989 - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to develop a drought management plan for the Garrison Dam Project in North Dakota known as Lake Sakakawea. Requires that the Project be managed for recreation and water conservation purposes and that a citizens' advisory group participate in project management decisions.

titles.title: North Dakota Reservoir Management Improvement Act of 1989
A bill to ensure the continued stability and viability of recreational opportunities on Lake Sakakawea in the State of North Dakota.
